template:
Based on the following reference notification templates, create engaging mobile-friendly notification templates. Each template should have a separate Message Title and Message Body.

**Requirements:**
- **Message Title**: Maximum 30 characters, punchy and attention-grabbing
- **Message Body**: Maximum 100 characters, compelling and action-oriented
- Include relevant emojis to increase engagement
- Create urgency or highlight value proposition
- Mobile-optimized for small screens
- Clear call-to-action

**Format for each template:**
Template X:
Message Title: [Title here]
Message Body: [Body here]

Reference templates: {reference_templates}

Generate new mobile-friendly notification templates: based on the no_of templates will passed as the following message
